frontMatter.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Write4
frontMatter.summary: Find and manipulate gadgets to construct an arbitrary write primitive, then use it to learn where and how to get your data into process memory.

prev.title: Static Analysis of Malware Strings
prev.summary: Strings challenges contains an un-encrypted flag stored within the executable. When run, the program will output an MD5 hash of the flag but not the original. Can you extract the flag?

next.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Split
next.summary: Combine elements from the ret2win challenge that have been split apart to beat this challenge. Learn how to use another tool whilst crafting a short ROP chain.
